summary: ClearForm P0 Features testing complete. All features working correctly. Frontend now dynamically fetches packages/plans from backend APIs. Stripe checkout integration working in test mode.
context_for_next_testing_agent: ClearForm P0 features fully functional. Frontend dynamically fetches credit packages and subscription plans from backend APIs. Stripe checkout working in test mode.

backend_api.GET /api/public/v2/services?category=cle: PASS - CLEARFORM service exists in catalogue
backend_api.GET /api/clearform/subscriptions/plans: PASS - Returns 4 plans (free, starter, professional, unlimited)
backend_api.POST /api/clearform/credits/purchase: PASS - Stripe checkout created for all packages

frontend_ui.dashboard: PASS - Shows credit balance, recent documents
frontend_ui.credits_page: PASS - Dynamically loads 4 packages and 4 plans from API
frontend_ui.subscription_plans_display: PASS - Shows correct plans (Free, Starter £4.99, Professional £9.99, Unlimited £24.99)
frontend_ui.stripe_checkout: PASS - Shows correct product (ClearForm - 10 Credits) and price (£9.99)
frontend_ui.document_page: PASS - PDF Preview and Text View tabs work
frontend_ui.pdf_viewer_controls: PASS - Zoom in/out, page navigation working
frontend_ui.payment_success_page: PASS - Shows success message with Create Document and Dashboard buttons
